sentences.en: In a final bravura the ballerina appeared to be floating in water.
sentences.cn: 在最后的一段表演里,芭蕾舞女看上去就像漂浮在水中一样.

sentences.en: The film is directed with a technical bravura and visual splendour.
sentences.cn: 这部电影的导演过分卖弄摄影技巧，追求华丽炫目的视觉效果。

sentences.en: The music ends with a display of bravura.
sentences.cn: 音乐以一段壮丽的乐章结束.

sentences.en: This picture has a bravura of execution.

trans.tran_cn: 大胜的尝试，勇气的举动（显示演奏家技艺的壮丽的乐段），华美乐段
